languages.text: "Я понимаю, что ты охотилась на Немезита. Но убийство блюстительницы, кровавое гадание? Это точно было необходимо?"

traits.locale_text: "Я понимаю, что ты охотилась на Немезита. Но убийство блюстительницы? Гадание на крови невинной жертвы? Это точно было необходимо?"

languages.text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю, что ты охотилась на Немезита. Но убийство блюстительницы, кровавое гадание? Это точно было необходимо?"

traits.locale_text: "I understand. You were after Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using the blood of innocents in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
"I understand. You were after Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using the blood of innocents in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
"I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using the blood of innocents in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
"I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using the blood of innocents in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
"I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
"I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"

languages.text: «Comprendo. Estaba dando caza a Nemesitio, su presa. Pero... ¿matar a un guardia? ¿Usar sangre en un ritual de adivinación? ¿De verdad fue necesario?».
languages.original_text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"

traits.locale_text: «Comprendo. Estaba dando caza a Nemesitio, su presa. Pero... ¿matar a un guardia? ¿Usar sangre en un ritual de adivinación? ¿De verdad fue necesario?».

languages.text: 「理解したよ。お前はネメサイトを、自分の獲物を追っていた。だが…エンフォーサーを殺した？ディビネーションの儀式で血を使う？それは、本当に必要だったのか？」
languages.original_text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"

traits.locale_text: 「理解したよ。お前はネメサイトを、自分の獲物を追っていた。だが…エンフォーサーを殺した？ディビネーションの儀式で血を使う？それは、本当に必要だったのか？」

languages.text: “我能理解你当时正在追捕你的猎物涅墨斯特，可……你居然杀了一个执法者？还有他的鲜血进行占卜？这么做真的有必要吗？”
languages.original_text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"

traits.locale_text: “我能理解你当时正在追捕你的猎物涅墨斯特，可……你居然杀了一个执法者？还有他的鲜血进行占卜？这么做真的有必要吗？”

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. Ihr habt Nemesite verfolgt, Eure Beute. Aber ... Mord an einem Enforcer? Blut für einen Prophetieritus? War das wirklich notwendig?"
languages.original_text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. Ihr habt Nemesite verfolgt, Eure Beute. Aber ... Mord an einem Enforcer? Blut für einen Prophetieritus? War das wirklich notwendig?"

languages.text: « Je comprends. Vous pourchassiez Némésite, votre proie. Mais de là à tuer un prévôt et à vous livrer à un rite divinatoire sanglant... Était-ce vraiment nécessaire ? »
languages.original_text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. Vous pourchassiez Némésite, votre proie. Mais de là à tuer un prévôt et à vous livrer à un rite divinatoire sanglant... Était-ce vraiment nécessaire ? »

languages.text: "Anladım. Nemezit'i avlamanın peşindeydin. Ancak... İnfazcı öldürmenin gereği var mıydı? Kehanet ayininde kanını kullanman şart mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "I understand. You were chasing Nemesite, your quarry. But... killing an enforcer? Using blood in a divination rite? Was that truly necessary?"
